title: Automated Rigger
text:
Summary: Python based rigging tools scripted in Python for Maya.

Description: Python based tools that provide a UI to automated rigging in Maya VFX software by providing tools for an artist to quickly build a skeleton to bind to a model.

Technology: Python2, Maya

title: Python / Maya Show reel
text:
Summary: Various python tools

Description:

- My automated rigging tools used in advertising to speed up binding controlls to models.

- The custom muscle simulation system written from scratch in python implementing volume perserving algorithms, with added UI and options to mirror bind them to a skeleton.

- The flocking algorithm was written in python and takes various attributes to allow a user to alter the flocks behaviour.

title: Digital Workshop
text:
Summary: Learning platform funded by google to provide online tuition for various online subjects.

My Role: Leading both frontend and backend devs to add new and improve existing functionality to an existing product.


Technology: AngularJs, Python2, Webapp2, Google Appengine, Circle CI, Docker

title: Olympic Channel
text:
Summary: Olympic channel is an on demand streaming service for olympic content.

My Role: Leading a backend team in architecting a solution, building the project and integrate with core API.


Technology: Python2 / Python3, Django, AWS, NGINX, Jenkins, Postgres, Vagrant

title: This Website
text:
Summary: A simple single page app built using AngularJs, Tornado and Mongo, built to experiement with different web technologies.


Technology: AngularJs, Python3, Tornado, MongoDB, Docker

title: Kill The Marvel Universe
text:
Summary: Data science learning exercise, scrapes data from the Marvel API and will build a network of releationships between superheros, used to solve the question of which are the most influential characters in the Marvel Universe.


Technology: Python3, matplotlib, networkx

title: Weather App
text:
Summary: Project to learn React, pulls data from http://openweathermap.org/api then displays it as a series of charts.


Technology: Python3, Django, React

title: Real Time Chat
text:
Summary: A simpel chatroom built with nodeJs websockets and requireJs.


Technology: nodeJs, Express, requireJs

title: Ray Tracer
text:
Summary: A Ray Tracer built in C++ to learn C++ and graphics programming.


Technology: C++

title: Twitter Bot
text:
Summary: Twitter bot built to learn how to poll data from twitter for use in other projects that could use twitter data. This project will compare the popularity of two hash tags over time.


Technology: Python, Django, Twitter API, Postgres
